DD_Attribute.name: observation_id
DD_Attribute.definition: The Lucy Mission observation identifier.

DD_Attribute.name: observation_id_count
DD_Attribute.definition: The Lucy Mission observation identifier counter. This number increments by 1 with each planned observation sequence (L'LORRI only).

DD_Attribute.name: observation_complete
DD_Attribute.definition: The Lucy Mission observation completion status.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: The observation is complete as planned.
Available information is insufficient to determine completion status.

DD_Attribute.name: observation_missing_packets
DD_Attribute.definition: The number of missing packets in the observation. The best data quality has no missing packets.

DD_Attribute.name: start_sclk
DD_Attribute.definition: The Lucy spacecraft clock (SCLK) time (in seconds) at the start of the observation.

DD_Attribute.name: mid_sclk
DD_Attribute.definition: The Lucy spacecraft clock (SCLK) time (in seconds) at the mid-time of the observation.

DD_Attribute.name: stop_sclk
DD_Attribute.definition: The Lucy spacecraft clock (SCLK) time (in seconds) at the end of the observation.

DD_Attribute.name: mid_utc
DD_Attribute.definition: The middle time of the observation in ISO UTC format "YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.sss"

DD_Attribute.name: mid_sclk_string
DD_Attribute.definition: The middle time of the observation in Lucy spacecraft clock string partition/SSSSSSSSSS-PPPPP, where S is seconds and P are ticks in units of 1/66535 of a second.

DD_Attribute.name: mid_utc_doy
DD_Attribute.definition: The middle time of the observation in ISO DOY format, YYYY-DOYTHH:MM:SS.sss

DD_Attribute.name: mid_utc_jd
DD_Attribute.definition: The middle time of the observation in Julian day format,

DD_Attribute.name: mid_ephemeris_time
DD_Attribute.definition: The middle time of the observation in ephemeris time, seconds past J2000, TDB.

DD_Attribute.name: ccsds_sclk_time
DD_Attribute.definition: The Lucy spacecraft clock time of the CCSDS playback timestamp in seconds.

DD_Attribute.name: load_identifier
DD_Attribute.definition: The command sequence load identifier

DD_Attribute.name: mission_segment
DD_Attribute.definition: The Lucy Mission segment

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: The Cruise 1 Lucy Mission segment from date XXXX to date XXX.
The EGA 1 (Earth Gravity Assist) Lucy Mission segment from date XXXX to date XXX.

DD_Attribute.name: sap_identifier
DD_Attribute.definition: The Lucy Mission science activity plan identifier.

DD_Attribute.name: visit_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The Lucy Mission trojan asteroid visit name.

DD_Attribute.name: instrument_side
DD_Attribute.definition: The Lucy elctronics side.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: The "A" electronics side. This is the default electronics side.
The "B" electronics side. This is the redundant fault protection side used in case of an error on the "A" side.

DD_Attribute.name: llorri_status
DD_Attribute.definition: The status of the L'LORRI instrument.

DD_Attribute.name: lralph_status
DD_Attribute.definition: The status of the L'RALPH instrument.

DD_Attribute.name: ltes_status
DD_Attribute.definition: The status of the L'TES instrument.

DD_Attribute.name: ttcam_status
DD_Attribute.definition: The status of the TTCAM instrument.

DD_Attribute.name: target_fov_count
DD_Attribute.definition: The number of possible targets in FOV (SPICE-derived).

DD_Attribute.name: target_fov_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The name of the possible target in FOV (SPICE-derived).

DD_Attribute.name: internal_product_version_id
DD_Attribute.definition: The Lucy pipeline internal data processing version number. This number is likely to be grater than the PDS version number given in the version_id attribute in the Observation_Area.

DD_Attribute.name: attached_sync_marker_dec
DD_Attribute.definition: Attached Sync Marker, decimal representation.

DD_Attribute.name: attached_sync_marker_hex
DD_Attribute.definition: Attached Sync Marker, hexidecimal representation.

DD_Attribute.name: latch_count
DD_Attribute.definition: The number of times a latchup has occurred.

DD_Attribute.name: calibration_lamp_level_1
DD_Attribute.definition: The Digital Number (DN) setting for calibration lamp one.

DD_Attribute.name: calibration_lamp_level_2
DD_Attribute.definition: The Digital Number (DN) setting for calibration lamp two.

DD_Attribute.name: playback_start
DD_Attribute.definition: Playback science header timstamp of the first m4 packet used in spacecraft clock seconds.

DD_Attribute.name: playback_end
DD_Attribute.definition: Playback science header timstamp of the last m4 packet used in spacecraft clock seconds.

DD_Attribute.name: playback_bad_pixel_mask_status
DD_Attribute.definition: Status of the bad pixel map, true or false

DD_Attribute.name: playback_truncation_status
DD_Attribute.definition: Status of the truncation enabled, true or false

DD_Attribute.name: playback_header_type
DD_Attribute.definition: Playback header type

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: CDS is not used in the current LEISA observation (TBR)
LIESA CDS mode is selected for the current observation (TBR)
MVIC is selected for the current observation (TBR)
Other values to be filled in. This is a placeholder.(TBR)

DD_Attribute.name: test_pattern_setting
DD_Attribute.definition: The instrument test pattern setting, 0 is science, 1 is test pattern.

DD_Attribute.name: hs_xtrack_start_row
DD_Attribute.definition: The cross track start row from the high speed header.

DD_Attribute.name: scan_row_pixels
DD_Attribute.definition: The number of pixels in the scan row.

DD_Attribute.name: fpecrc_error_flag
DD_Attribute.definition: FPE checksum error flag, true or false

DD_Attribute.name: m4_calibration_state
DD_Attribute.definition: Calibration state (TBR)

DD_Attribute.name: m4_blackbody_setting
DD_Attribute.definition: Blackbody state (TBR)

DD_Attribute.name: m4_filament_setting
DD_Attribute.definition: Filament setting (TBR)

DD_Attribute.name: fpe_drop_frames
DD_Attribute.definition: Number of FPE drop frames (TBR).

DD_Attribute.name: mce_scan_rate
DD_Attribute.definition: The MCE scan rate (TBR).

DD_Attribute.name: first_packet_timestamp
DD_Attribute.definition: The timestamp of the first packet recorded in spacraft clock seconds.

DD_Attribute.name: last_packet_timestamp
DD_Attribute.definition: The timestamp of the last packet recorded in spacraft clock seconds.

DD_Attribute.name: xsum_error_flag_status
DD_Attribute.definition: Xsum flag indicating if there are errors in the stored data packet, true or false

DD_Attribute.name: lr_acquisition_start_block
DD_Attribute.definition: The Lralph observation acquisition start block address.

DD_Attribute.name: mce_start_postion
DD_Attribute.definition: The MCE start position (TBR), units TBD

DD_Attribute.name: mce_end_postion
DD_Attribute.definition: The MCE start position (TBR), units TBD

DD_Attribute.name: board_selection
DD_Attribute.definition: The instrument side selected

DD_Attribute.name: blocks_allocated
DD_Attribute.definition: The number of blocks allocated

DD_Attribute.name: mvic_ccd_list
DD_Attribute.definition: List of the MVIC CCDs used in this observation.

DD_Attribute.name: mvic_actual_atrack_summing
DD_Attribute.definition: MVIC actual along track pixel summing.

DD_Attribute.name: mvic_actual_xtrack_summing
DD_Attribute.definition: MVIC actual along track pixel summing.

DD_Attribute.name: mvic_planned_atrack_summing
DD_Attribute.definition: MVIC actual summing mode.

DD_Attribute.name: mvic_planned_xtrack_summing
DD_Attribute.definition: MVIC planned along track pixel summing.

DD_Attribute.name: mvic_summing_mode
DD_Attribute.definition: MVIC planned summing mode.

DD_Attribute.name: actual_ccd1_tdi_configuration
DD_Attribute.definition: Actual CCD 1 TDI configuration.

DD_Attribute.name: actual_ccd2_tdi_configuration
DD_Attribute.definition: Actual CCD 2 TDI configuration.

DD_Attribute.name: actual_ccd3_tdi_configuration
DD_Attribute.definition: Actual CCD 3 TDI configuration.

DD_Attribute.name: actual_ccd4_tdi_configuration
DD_Attribute.definition: Actual CCD 4 TDI configuration.

DD_Attribute.name: actual_ccd5_tdi_configuration
DD_Attribute.definition: Actual CCD 5 TDI configuration.

DD_Attribute.name: actual_ccd6_tdi_configuration
DD_Attribute.definition: Actual CCD 6 TDI configuration.

DD_Attribute.name: planned_ccd1_tdi_configuration
DD_Attribute.definition: The planned CCD 1 TDI configuration.

DD_Attribute.name: planned_ccd2_tdi_configuration
DD_Attribute.definition: The planned CCD 2 TDI configuration.

DD_Attribute.name: planned_ccd3_tdi_configuration
DD_Attribute.definition: The planned CCD 3 TDI configuration.

DD_Attribute.name: planned_ccd4_tdi_configuration
DD_Attribute.definition: The planned CCD 4 TDI configuration.

DD_Attribute.name: planned_ccd5_tdi_configuration
DD_Attribute.definition: The planned CCD 5 TDI configuration.

DD_Attribute.name: planned_ccd6_tdi_configuration
DD_Attribute.definition: The planned CCD 6 TDI configuration.

DD_Attribute.name: mvic_fpe_vis_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: The MVIC FPE VIS Temperature

DD_Attribute.name: mvic_observation_allocation
DD_Attribute.definition: MVIC allocated observation duration

DD_Attribute.name: mvic_tdi_row_integration_time
DD_Attribute.definition: MVIC allocated observation duration

DD_Attribute.name: leisa_mode
DD_Attribute.definition: LEISA observation mode, T is CDS, F is NONCDS. (TBR)

DD_Attribute.name: leisa_observation_allocation
DD_Attribute.definition: LEISA observation allocation duration.

DD_Attribute.name: leisa_integration_time
DD_Attribute.definition: LEISA observation integration time (TBR)

DD_Attribute.name: leisa_atrack_start_channel
DD_Attribute.definition: LEISA along track start channel

DD_Attribute.name: leisa_atrack_num_channels
DD_Attribute.definition: LEISA along track number of channels.

DD_Attribute.name: leisa_xtrack_start_row
DD_Attribute.definition: LEISA cross track start row.

DD_Attribute.name: leisa_xtrack_num_rows
DD_Attribute.definition: LEISA cross track number of rows.

DD_Attribute.name: leisa_offset
DD_Attribute.definition: LEISA offset (TBR)

DD_Attribute.name: leisa_fpe_ir_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: LEISA FPE IR Temperature (TBR)

DD_Class.name: Lucy_Observation_Time_Information
DD_Class.definition: Lucy Mission observation identification and timing information.

DD_Class.name: Lucy_Observation_Planning
DD_Class.definition: The Lucy Mission observation planning class and attributes describe the observation planning information needed to understand the planned spacecraft observations.

DD_Class.name: Lucy_Target_List
DD_Class.definition: The Lucy Mission class that contains the target list of potential targets in a given observation.

DD_Class.name: Lucy_Product_Information
DD_Class.definition: The Lucy Mission class that contains attributes specific to the labeled data product.

DD_Class.name: LLORRI_Instrument_Parameters
DD_Class.definition: The Lucy LORRI instrument class that contains instrument specific attributes relevant to the labeled data product.

DD_Class.name: LRalph_Instrument_Common_Parameters
DD_Class.definition: The Lucy LRalph instrument class that contains the common (LEISA and MVIC) instrument specific attributes relevant to the labeled data product.

DD_Class.name: LEISA_Instrument_Parameters
DD_Class.definition: The Lucy LRalph LEISA class that contains the instrument specific attributes relevant to the labeled data product.

DD_Class.name: MVIC_Instrument_Parameters
DD_Class.definition: The Lucy LRalph MVIC class that contains the instrument specific attributes relevant to the labeled data product.
